price: Kandi mu by’ukuri nyuma yabo, mwe tuzabatuza mu gihugu (cyabo). Ibyo ni kuri wa wundi utinya kuzahagarara imbere yanjye (ku munsi w’ibarura) akanatinya ibihano byanjye.
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
translations: And surely We will make you dwell
